item.title: Blackstone Private Debt Fund Cuts Value of Largest Holding
item.description: A Blackstone Inc. fund further cut the value of a private credit loan for Thoma Bravo-backed software company Medallia Inc., revealing growing stress for its single largest investment.

item.title: Blackstone Agrees to Acquire Enverus in $6 Billion-Plus Deal
item.description: Blackstone Inc. has agreed to buy energy data platform Enverus in one of its biggest acquisitions of the year.

item.title: Blackstone Tells Employees They Can Return to NYC Office Aug. 4
item.description: Blackstone Inc. is reopening its New York headquarters on Monday after keeping the office shuttered in the wake of a shooting spree that killed four people, including one of its senior executives.
